statement: I like organizing things and events.
I can tell when someone is sincere or insincere.
I place high priority in encouraging others in my life.
I am totally convinced that God will fulfill His Word even if I don't see it yet.
I value influencing others for the kingdom of God through finances.
I look for opportunities to pray for those who are sick.
I enjoy doing the little things even if I don't get the credit.
I like having people over to my house.
I like spending hours in prayer for other people.
I get insights about others while praying for them even though I don't know them.
I like to motivate others to get involved.
I am deeply moved for those who are hurting when I see them.
I am confident that God will use me to enact His miracles.
I sometimes know exactly what God wants to do in a person or ministry at a specific point in time.
I enjoy serving even if no one is looking.
Explaining God's Word to others is important to me.
I have prayed in a language I have never learned.
God has used me to interpret a prayer in tongues.
I sometimes get insights from God about the proper course of action others should take.
I am passionate about the little things that make and event or organization successful.
I can sense whether a person is moving in the Holy Spirit, influenced by an evil spirit or moving in the flesh.
I try to communicate and act in a loving and caring way.
I am confident to ask God for big things.
I find joy in giving more than my tithe.
I strongly believe that God can do miraculous healings today.
Helping others is of great importance to me.
People seldom comment that my home is always warm and welcoming.
When I hear about situations of people and places, I always feel a burden to pray.
I sometimes get specific insights about a person that God reveals and could not have been naturally known.
I prefer to take the lead in projects or events.
I empathize easily when I hear sad stories.
I have seen impossible things has happen when I prayed for it.
I sometimes have a strong sense of what God wants to say to people in response to particular situations.
I usually am among the first to volunteer when something practical needs to be done to help those in need.
I share biblical truth with others in hopes of their personal growth.
I pray in tongues daily.
Sometimes I get impressions or revelations when I hear people pray in tongues.
When a person has a problem, I can frequently guide him or her to the best biblical solution.
I easily create and enjoy completing a task list.
I can identify issues or problems before others.
I look for ways to encourage other people.
I completely trust that God is for me in every situation.
Making more money means that I can give more.
God has used me to bring healing to those who are sick.
I find joy in helping someone accomplish a task or vision that God has given.
Our home is always open to whomever God brings our way.
People often describe me as a prayer warrior.
People often affirm a specific insight that I expressed or prayed about them personally.
I delegate responsibilities to accomplish tasks.
I am motivated to help those who are less fortunate.
I have a constant hunger to see God's miraculous power.
People have told me that I have communicated timely messages that ministered to them.
I like serving even in the small things that others pass over.
I enjoy knowing biblical details and helping others to understand them.
Praying in the Spirit is encouraging and important to me.
I feel the burden to ask the Lord for an interpretation when I hear somebody pray in the spirit.
People come to me for advice on important decisions and counsel on spiritual problems.
